Posts.Title: Taylor's Mother's Maiden Name
Posts.ImageDescription: A screenshot of an old photograph of Taylor's mother captioned with her mother's maiden name
Posts.RiskReason: Her maiden name could be used to answer a security question to gain access to Taylor's online accounts.

Posts.Title: Taylor's Monday Workout
Posts.ImageDescription: A screenshot of a social media post featuring the map and Taylor's workout route
Posts.RiskReason: Her workout routine reveals her location of where she worked out and near her home.
